languages.text: {n}Рука мутанта скрывается под лохмотьями, но не успевает выхватить оружие — ваш собеседник замирает и съеживается, находясь под вашим прицелом.{/n} "Не надо... По... пожалуйста... Что я вам сделал?"
{n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Рука мутанта скрывается под лохмотьями, но не успевает выхватить оружие — ваш собеседник замирает и съеживается, находясь под вашим прицелом.{/n} "Не надо... По... пожалуйста... Что я вам сделал?"

traits.speaker: TrampMain

traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}変異体の手がボロ布の下に潜り込むが、武器をつかむのに間に合わない。彼は凍りつき、あなたの銃身の下で縮こまる。{/n}「頼む…やめてくれ…俺があんたに何したってんだ？」
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}変異体の手がボロ布の下に潜り込むが、武器をつかむのに間に合わない。彼は凍りつき、あなたの銃身の下で縮こまる。{/n}「頼む…やめてくれ…俺があんたに何したってんだ？」
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}变种人伸手去拿衣服下面的武器，但他的动作比你慢。你的枪口已经对准了他，他被吓呆了。{/n}“别……别这样……饶、饶命啊……我对你做过什么坏事吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}变种人伸手去拿衣服下面的武器，但他的动作比你慢。你的枪口已经对准了他，他被吓呆了。{/n}“别……别这样……饶、饶命啊……我对你做过什么坏事吗？”
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}La mano del mutante se sumerge bajo sus harapos, pero no consigue agarrar su arma a tiempo. Se congela y se encoge bajo el cañón de tu arma.{/n} «No... P-por favor... ¿Qué le he hecho?».
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mano del mutante se sumerge bajo sus harapos, pero no consigue agarrar su arma a tiempo. Se congela y se encoge bajo el cañón de tu arma.{/n} «No... P-por favor... ¿Qué le he hecho?».
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Die Hand des Mutanten taucht unter seine Lumpen, doch er kann seine Waffe nicht schnell genug herausziehen. Er erstarrt und schrumpft vor dem Lauf deiner Waffe zusammen.{/n} "Nicht ... B-Bitte ... Was habe ich Euch je getan?"
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Hand des Mutanten taucht unter seine Lumpen, doch er kann seine Waffe nicht schnell genug herausziehen. Er erstarrt und schrumpft vor dem Lauf deiner Waffe zusammen.{/n} "Nicht ... B-Bitte ... Was habe ich Euch je getan?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Le mutant plonge la main dans ses guenilles pour s'emparer de son pistolet, mais il est déjà trop tard. Il se recroqueville devant le canon de votre arme.{/n} « Faites pas ça... P-pitié... Qu'est-ce que je vous ai fait pour mériter ça ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le mutant plonge la main dans ses guenilles pour s'emparer de son pistolet, mais il est déjà trop tard. Il se recroqueville devant le canon de votre arme.{/n} « Faites pas ça... P-pitié... Qu'est-ce que je vous ai fait pour mériter ça ? »
traits.speaker: TrampMain

languages.text: {n}Mutant, elini üzerine sarındığı bezlere doğru götürse de silahını vaktinde doğrultamıyor. Donup kalıyor ve namlunun ucunda küçülüyor.{/n} "Yapma... N'olur... Sana yanlış yapmadım ya."
languages.original_text: {n}The mutant's hand dives under his rags but fails to grab his weapon in time. He freezes and shrinks under the barrel of your gun.{/n} "Don't... P-please... What'd I ever do to you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Mutant, elini üzerine sarındığı bezlere doğru götürüyor ama silahını zamanında doğrultamıyor. Donup kalıyor ve namlunun ucunda küçülüyor.{/n} "Yapma... Lütfen... Sana bir yanlışım oldu mu?"
traits.speaker: TrampMain
